title: Podcast Episode 124.2 – HEAVY EQUIPMENT by Skye Warren
description:
Our audiobook this week is HEAVY EQUIPMENT by Skye Warren

I’ve been raised as the good, obedient daughter, but I never expected to be sold to pay my father’s debts. Cold. Rough. Merciless. The foreman of the construction crew is going to make me pay every last cent.

Skye Warren Audiobooks: https://amzn.to/3egPGjm
Skye Warren eBooks: https://bit.ly/3gw2tBk
Private Property: https://bit.ly/3xfZRgH

Mentioned Books
You Had Me at Hola by Alexis Daria
HOW TO BREAK UP WITH YOUR PHONE by Catherine Price
SAVING SIENNA by Katie Reus
DAX by Fiona Davenport
SHE'S MY EVERYTHING by Sam Crescent

RMR Website: https://bit.ly/3ifFIyw
Weekly New Release: https://bit.ly/30iDete

Podcast Production by Lola
